zhao.algorithmMagic.algorithm.classificationAlgorithm

类 DistanceClassification

  • java.lang.Object
    • zhao.algorithmMagic.algorithm.classificationAlgorithm.DistanceClassification
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ClassificationAlgorithm, OperationAlgorithm
    直接已知子类:
    KMeans, KnnClassification, UDFDistanceClassification

    public abstract class DistanceClassification
extends Object
implements ClassificationAlgorithm
    通过距离算法实现分类的算法抽象，实现于该类将能够支持通过距离进行分类的方式。

    The over-distance algorithm realizes the algorithm abstraction of classification. The implementation of this class will be able to support the way of classification by distance.

    作者:
    zhao

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法

      DistanceAlgorithm distanceAlgorithm()
      当前的分类中距离计算组件
      String getAlgorithmName() 
      boolean init()
      算法模块的初始化方法，在这里您可以进行组件的初始化方法，当初始化成功之后，该算法就可以处于就绪的状态，一般这里就是将自己添加到算法管理类中 The initialization method of the algorithm module, here you can perform the initialization method of the component, when the initialization is successful, the algorithm can be in a ready state, generally here is to add yourself to the algorithm management class
      void setDistanceAlgorithm(DistanceAlgorithm distanceAlgorithm)
      设置本组件中的分类算法使用哪个组件 Set which component is used by the classification algorithm in this component

    • 方法详细资料

      • setDistanceAlgorithm

        public final void setDistanceAlgorithm(DistanceAlgorithm distanceAlgorithm)
        设置本组件中的分类算法使用哪个组件

        Set which component is used by the classification algorithm in this component

        参数:
        distanceAlgorithm - 本组件进行分类时，要使用的分类算法组件。

        The classification algorithm component to be used when classifying this component.

      • getAlgorithmName

        public final String getAlgorithmName()
        指定者:
        getAlgorithmName 在接口中 OperationAlgorithm
        返回:
        该算法组件的名称，也是一个识别码，在获取算法的时候您可以通过该名称获取到算法对象

        The name of the algorithm component is also an identification code. You can obtain the algorithm object through this name when obtaining the algorithm.

      • init

        public final boolean init()
        算法模块的初始化方法，在这里您可以进行组件的初始化方法，当初始化成功之后，该算法就可以处于就绪的状态，一般这里就是将自己添加到算法管理类中

        The initialization method of the algorithm module, here you can perform the initialization method of the component, when the initialization is successful, the algorithm can be in a ready state, generally here is to add yourself to the algorithm management class

        指定者:
        init 在接口中 OperationAlgorithm
        返回:
        初始化成功或失败。

        Initialization succeeded or failed.

      • distanceAlgorithm

        public final DistanceAlgorithm distanceAlgorithm()
        当前的分类中距离计算组件
        返回:
        距离计算组件对象
